boundary_advection::boundary_advective_flux_if Interface Reference

Public Member Functions

subroutine boundary_advective_flux_if (flux_lo, flux_hi, conc_lo, conc_hi, flow_lo, flow_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dt, dx)

Detailed Description

Calculate boundary advection.

Generic interface for calculating BC advection routine that should be fulfilled by client programs

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

subroutine boundary_advection::boundary_advective_flux_if::boundary_advective_flux_if ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  flux_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  flux_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow_hi,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx 
)
Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]flux_loFlux on lo side of cell, time centered
[in,out]flux_hiFlux on hi side of cell, time centered
[in]flow_loFlow on lo side of cells centered in time
[in]flow_hiFlow on hi side of cells centered in time
[in]conc_loConcentration extrapolated to lo face
[in]conc_hiConcentration extrapolated to hi face
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
